name: GetReviewComments
description:
Retrieve comments for a specific pull request review.

Use this tool to obtain comments associated with a specific pull request review in a GitHub repository. Ideal for tracking review discussions and understanding feedback provided by reviewers.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. This name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The number that identifies the pull request to fetch comments from.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: review_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the review for which comments are being fetched.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the review.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page, up to a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: result_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of the results to fetch. Used to navigate paginated results.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
